mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply(rno, bno, reply, replyer,replydate,updatedate, rrno, derno) values (seq_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer},SYSDATE,SYSDATE,#{rrno}, #{derno})
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set reply=#{reply}, updatedate = sysdate where rno=#{rno}
mapper.select: select rno, bno, reply, replyer, replyDate, updatedate from tbl_reply where bno =#{bno} order by rno asc
select count(*) from tbl_reply where bno = #{bno}
